content: x-cli is a command-line interface (CLI) tool designed for use with AI agents like Claude Code, Codex, OpenClaw, or OpenCode, and is not a Master Control Program (MCP), meaning it does not consume context space when inactive.
To set up x-cli in an agent session, paste the command: "Setup https://github.com/Infatoshi/x-cli".

x-cli provides commands for interacting with Twitter (or X) across several categories: Post (tweet post, reply, quote, delete), Read (tweet get, search, user timeline, mentions), Users (user get, followers, following), Engage (like, retweet), Bookmarks (me bookmarks, bookmark, unbookmark), and Analytics (tweet metrics).
x-cli commands that require a tweet identifier can accept either the full tweet URL (e.g., https://x.com/user/status/123) or just the numerical tweet ID (e.g., 123).
